heading: Your National Insurance number
hint: It's on your National Insurance card, benefit letter, payslip or P60. For example, QQ 12 34 56 C.
details-link-text: What is my National Insurance number?
details-summary-text: If you are unable to locate your National Insurance number, refer to
nino-link-text: find your National Insurance number on GOV.UK (opens in a new tab)
